resources.string: An IT Architect by profession, Srinivas Alluri (Srini) founded the IT company Sandhata Technologies, with operations in the UK and India. He maintains a simple lifestyle and dedicates his entire personal life towards making his mission inspired by great personalities including the like of Mahatma Gandhi, Swami Vivekananda, Ramana Maharshi among others.

Our Mission is to make the world Healthy, Happy, and Harmonious: The 3H Way. Millions of people in India lack access to basic health, education, and the freedom to participate in the economy equally. We strive to reach out to bring a change through our voluntary, initiatives aimed for the individual, family, village, and society. Through our efforts we work to improve human values and quality of life by educating, sharing and participating in their life through natural and eco-friendly lifestyles and livelihood.
We believe every person deserves the choice to live with dignity not dependence
Manavata has team members worldwide, including in India, the United Kingdom, and the United States. Learn more about this at the link below.

Take initiatives and serve based on needs of the people, society, and nature. At proper time and place, at the time of distress, disaster and disability. Charity given out of duty, at the proper time and place, to a worthy person or a cause, and without expectation of return is considered to be charity in the mode of goodness.
